root.title: Loyal Secretary Joke
root.content: Bernice had been employed at the same office for over 50 years and was the bossâ€™s top secretary. Everyone was jealous of her. Every day when Bernice showed up for work she would open the drawer to her left, peek inside, and then lock it. When she finally died, her coworker Sandy, who was dying of curiosity, made it her mission to figure out what was in that drawer.
